channel.title: [07] Post your Character
channel.description:
[u][b][size=15pt]Show off your Oldschool Runescape character [/size][/b][/u]
[u][b]Rules[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Provide plausible proof that you own the account otherwise you will not be taken seriously and your post may be removed.[/li] [li]You do not have to post your username or all of your levels (They may be blanked out).[/li] [li]Follow the usual forum rules, and be nice.[/li][/ul]
Also feel free to comment on each other’s levels, though a moderator may prune these posts later if they are finished with and answered to make it a smaller and more readable thread.
This sticky is here for people whom just want to post their Runescape levels and look at other regular forum users accounts.

item.title: [07] Post your Character
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Scape-JAVA:

My phone broke on a field exercise a few months ago and I haven’t really been able to play but I tried logging on the other day but I enabled the two step verification thing and I’m not sure how I can get another code to login. Anybody know how to fix this? L0l

I guess send Jagex a message in the message center or try to recover the account so it deactivates the two-step verification? I’m not sure as I assume it asks you to do the two-step verification first before being able to recover but that wouldn’t make sense… not sure L0L. Probably sending them a message in the message center if you can (or emailing them somehow).

Read full topic

item.title: [07] Post your Character
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“nolan2131, post:811, topic:494186”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=612419.msg4476327#msg4476327 date=1426090994]

You should invest in a 99, like cooking or fm.

What would he be investing in there??

new sig lolo

I picked them because they’re cheap and fast… You profit from cooking and fm costs 3-4m tops

I had bought 50k lobsters at one point and was in the process of 99 cooking w/ 100k exp an hour, but I get extremely board doing repetitive stuff like that Cooked like 2k of them and quit.

I honestly can’t ever be bothered to get a 99. Was once close to 99 wc, but got to 83 and it got too long so… fudge it.
[/quote]

I’m the same way, I never train the same skill. Usually play like 4 different minigames and train like 8 different stats while online.[/quote]
Haha yeah. Been grinding out recently though. The GE and trade timer really pisses me off. 24 hours; Jagex is on a new level of crack.

Read full topic
